Bishop Botanicals Botanical Seed Facial Oil

Brand: Bishop Botanicals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Camelina Sativa (Camelina) Oil, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Oil, Squalane, Pu

t) Oil, Squalane, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Asparagus Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Extract, Propanediol, Milk Thistle Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate,

Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Commiphora Myrrha (Myrrh) Oil.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
